features: Hybrid silicone earbuds provide long lasting comfort; small, medium and large earbuds are included to fine tune your fitment.Specific uses for product : Music

Product Note : If the size of the earbud tips does not match the size of your ear canals or the headset is not worn properly in your ears, you may not obtain the correct sound qualities or call performance. Change the earbud tips to ones that fit more snugly in your ears
High quality 9 mm dome type driver units coupled with high-energy neodymium magnets produce great sounding treble and midrange with powerful bass response.
The included Y-type cord with cord-slider prevents tangles on the go.
Accent your style with 2-tone design and colors.
body.description: Great sound with integrated mic and smartphone playback control, in fashionable colors to compliment your style. The 9mm driver units deliver powerful bass while the hybrid silicone ear buds ensure a secure fit.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 16,859 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sony MDREX15 Fashion Color EX Series Earbuds Great sound, designed for comfort with fashionable colors to compliment your style. The 9mm drivers units deliver powerful bass while hybrid silicone ear buds ensure a secure fit.

Powerful, Balanced Sound With 9 mm Neodymium Drivers feel the thump of bass and the clarity of midrange and treble sounds with high-power neodymium magnets. Lightweight Lightweight for ultimate music mobility. Enjoy music for long hours without any discomfort. Comfortable Enjoy comfort and stability with hybrid silicone earbuds. 8 Hz - 22 kHz Frequency Range The wide band frequency range spanning 8Hz to 22kHz helps to hear the detail in every track and stay in tune with all your music.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars can't believe it's under $10 , same as $99 earpad
reviews.reviewText: Have been Sony fan more than 4 decades , for sure I would choice SONY.It's so far the most satisfy headset for working I have had.Sounds great with decent bass, clear mid, high pitches.I am using it for web / skype conference also listen to youtube music when I'm working.Top choice for low cost headset and best ROI ....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great but will not last long
reviews.reviewText: They work well if its work but wont last long trust me i tried everything in the book i brought maybe 20 pairs,at times things were my fault why they have broken.If you take good care of them what's going to happen is one side is going to go out first and then you going to have to rely only on one side for a while until that one finally goes out.they are not reliable long term no matter what you do i do not care what any other reviewer say if you see a review that says it last long they are lying or maybe their definition of long term is different.even if you mange to make them last longer then a few months the volume will for sure decrease, also it will start hanging up phones call and being slightly defective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sound is little bit low
reviews.reviewText: a pair of earbuds that are on the cheaper side, and while the overall quality is okay, I found the sound to be disappointingly low.On the positive side, the earbuds are affordable, making them accessible for those on a budget. However, the low volume can be a drawback, especially if you're looking for earbuds that deliver a bit more punch in the sound department.If you prioritize budget over high volume, these earbuds might still be suitable for casual use. But if you're someone who enjoys louder audio, you might want to consider investing a bit more in a higher-quality pair. Overall, they are decent for the price, but the low sound level is something to keep in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered for my computer at work they sound great, comfortable and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love these headphones
reviews.reviewText: Sony's MDREX15AP In-Ear Earbud Headphones are a perfect five-star choice. Beyond their excellent audio quality and functionality, these headphones offer a nostalgic design, providing both style and comfort. They fit snugly in the ear, ensuring a long-lasting and enjoyable listening experience. A great choice for music enthusiasts who appreciate a blend of retro charm and modern technology.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: According to amazon, I bought this in July of 2022. This week one of the buds stopped working and I was only getting sound in one ear, verified on multiple devices. I searched amazon for a replacement and this was one of the top results. So this pair lasted me about 18 months of intermittent usage. I'm a hybrid remote/office worker. This pair was in the office. I only used it a couple days a week and it never left my desk. Sounded good when it worked, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Alternative for Personal Listening
reviews.reviewText: After doing a lot of research on pricing and quality of bluetooth wireless earbuds and not being impressed with their performance, I went with the sony wired earbuds instead for the price and quality. I can use it on my phone and for music which satisfies my needs for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Satisfaction in usage, but the quality is questionable.
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase, and both headphones have experienced issues. The first one became completely unusable, and now with this one, there's an imbalance in volume between the left and right channels, along with significant distortion. It could be due to the product being relatively old, and the quality is a serious concern.
Achei que o isolamento de ruído seria melhor. Não recomendo se for usar na rua, com muito barulho ao redor. É um fone pra usar em um lugar sussegado sem muito ruido ao redor.

Dopo vari auricolari bluetooth acquistati, ho deciso di riprendere questi sony con Jack da usare con il mio PC per evitare delay e fuori sinc tra immagini e audio. La qualità degli auricolari è nella norma così come la qualità Sony con i suoi bassi belli carichi. Come al solito sono presenti gommini sostituibili con vari diametri per orecchie più piccole o grandi. È un prodotto con un buon rapporto qualità/prezzo.

Good enough for the price. I’ve had way better before, but not for €20.I simply needed the smallest in ear buds available that would fit under my helmet without being painful. These fit okay, but the actual performance (compared to others) isn’t all that great.Bass is seriously lacking in power and depth.
Cumplen con su función básica completamente. Buena calidad de audio y buen micrófono. Tienen un cable fino. Simple y barato. Recomendable para lo que es.
